page.title: 16Social Concern & News Cl. 7
page.content: {The N/S Link Road} Fleetwood has developed as a container port over the last few years and so the amount of heavy traffic has increased dramatically. To ease this a road link to the M55 has been planned. It would come through our block and cross over the road from Staining. Many people think that it would cut the village in two. Against this it would increase safety in Thornton and Poulton. {Our New Vicar} On Wed. 26th June 1985 the Rev. Martin Ernest Chancellor Joyce became the new vicar of Staining. A service was held at which the Institution was carried out by the Rt Rev David Stewart Cross MA Bishop of Blackburn, and the Induction by the Ven Kenneth Henry Gibbons BSc Archdeacon of Lancaster. Our school was represented by the Headteacher, Mr Geoffrey Bottomley BA.
